system.description:
Effect: The user may activate 1 Item within Reach that they have access to. The Use Action type changes depending on the item's effect or location:

  • If the item is equpped to the user's Belt Slot, it can be retrieved and used with 1 Simple Action.
  • If the item is currently stored in a container, it requires 1 Simple Action to open the container, and 1 Simple Action to retrieve and use the item.
